reviewText: In this DVD we know more of the little known (here) story of Mariana Pineda who was sentence to death during the reign of the tyrant king Ferdinad VII of Spain. She was young, rich, beautiful and noble, and gave up all that for the love of freedom for his country. The acting in the movie is great, mostly the one by Pepa Flores in the main character. As a singer, Pepa Flores is also known by the name "Marisol".
